106.movie_plot: A colorful array of characters compete at a national dog show.

5.movie_plot: After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

67.movie_plot: Captain Picard, with the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, must stop a renegade scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.

54.movie_plot: A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local millionaire, whom he befriends.

65.movie_name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1963)
65.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

17.movie_plot: When tradition prevents her from marrying the man she loves, a young woman discovers she has a unique talent for cooking.
